016
017package org.vafer.jdeb.utils;
018
019import java.io.BufferedReader;
020import java.io.IOException;
021import java.io.InputStream;
022import java.io.InputStreamReader;
023import java.nio.charset.Charset;
024import java.util.ArrayList;
025import java.util.List;
026
027public class FilteredFile {
028
029    public static final String DEFAULT_OPEN_TOKEN = "[[";
030    public static final String DEFAULT_CLOSE_TOKEN = "]]";
031
032    private String openToken;
033    private String closeToken;
034    private List<String> lines = new ArrayList<>();
035
036    @Deprecated
037    public FilteredFile(InputStream in, VariableResolver resolver) throws IOException {
038        this(in, resolver, Charset.defaultCharset());
039    }
040
041    public FilteredFile(InputStream in, VariableResolver resolver, Charset encoding) throws IOException {
042        this(in, resolver, encoding, DEFAULT_OPEN_TOKEN, DEFAULT_CLOSE_TOKEN);
043    }
044
045    public FilteredFile(InputStream in, VariableResolver resolver, Charset encoding, String openToken, String closeToken) throws IOException {
046        this.openToken = openToken;
047        this.closeToken = closeToken;
048        parse(in, resolver, encoding);
049    }
050
051    @Deprecated
052    public void setOpenToken(String token) {
053        openToken = token;
054    }
055
056    @Deprecated
057    public void setCloseToken(String token) {
058        closeToken = token;
059    }
060
061    private void parse(InputStream in, VariableResolver resolver, Charset encoding) throws IOException {
062        try (BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(in, encoding))) {
063            String line;
064            while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {
065                if (resolver != null) {
066                    lines.add(Utils.replaceVariables(resolver, line, openToken, closeToken));
067                } else {
068                    lines.add(line);
069                }
070            }
071        }
072    }
073
074    public String toString() {
075        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
076        for (String line : lines) {
077            builder.append(line).append('\n');
078        }
079        return builder.toString();
080    }
081}
